release.action: The list of results (pathways IDs) from BioMart is not trimmed to 2. Any problem in handling a long list should be handled by the client.
Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub) and junit.
Xrefs for Reactome reactions are now set to complete URLs instead of Reactome IDs, following the same criterion as xrefs from Rhea reactions.
Removed System.out.println's from the code. Using a proper Logger not to clutter catalina.out.
Updated to latest versions of ep-util and junit.
